description:
In this game you will see a collection of different logic riddles. After answering on each question you will be able to see the correct answer.

Why this game called 18+? - No, this is not what you thought. The game contain 18 amazing picture with animals, plus the game has several nice features. Whats why the game is called 18+

Features:
¥ 18 logic riddles (with answers).

¥ Stunning drawings of animals.

¥ At the end of the game, you will receive many achievements as a reward.

¥ Calm and relaxing music.
